title: Fragment, second half of 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: compound satin weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Rose satin with a pattern of circular beige medallions. Each medallion has a center of lilies and acanthus leaves surrounded by a wreath of imbricated leaves and rosettes. These, in turn, are encircled by another wreath of laurel leaves with daisies at intersection.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, second half of 19th century.
second half of 19th century. Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: compound satin weave. Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1920-19-60-b.
